docs.title: Overview
docs.body: Welcome to the mock documentation portal used to validate AgenticTest. Everything here is static content powered by Eleventy and Lunr, but the navigation flows mimic a real docs system.
docs.preview: Landing page with goals and quick tour.

docs.title: CLI Basics
docs.body: The Agentic CLI helps automate test workflows. Install via bun install -g agentic-cli and review commands such as agentic init and agentic trace list.

docs.title: Tracing Workflows
docs.body: Capture traces from the demo system. Steps include starting the recorder, executing actions, and exporting JSON.
docs.preview: How to capture and export traces.

docs.title: Testing Playbooks
docs.body: Chain traces and publish reports using playbooks. Content focuses on environment setup and artifact exports.
